title: Jokester for Android Wear
summary: Jokester for Android SmartWatch is guaranteed to put a smile on your face.
description: Brighten Your Day – and Your Wrist - with Jokester!Jokester turns any Android smartwatch into a humor hub with the carefully curated jokes delivered to your smartwatch at random intervals throughout the day.No matter what ails you - Jokester is the best medicine. Unless, of course, you need a real medicine.Sitting in a boring meeting? Having a bad day? Or simply want to have a few good laughs to raise your spirits? Jokester will keep your mood up by displaying hilarious jokes on your smartwatch – and letting you know the joke has arrived by vibrating your watch a little. Share with friends and family and put a smile on their face! Never get bored - new funny jokes are added every couple of days. Jokester is a part of A Smarter Watch family - Kanda Software’s suite of informative, motivational and entertainment apps that you can enjoy on your Android Wear devices.Features:● Set a time frame during the day when you want to see jokes on your smart watch;● Control how many jokes you want to receive per day – anywhere from 1 to 20;● Jokes are refreshed every couple of days automatically – no need to download anything;● Jokes are delivered to your Android Wear at random intervals, so you are always pleasantly surprised.
descriptionHTML:
Brighten Your Day – and Your Wrist - with Jokester!

Jokester turns any Android smartwatch into a humor hub with the carefully curated jokes delivered to your smartwatch at random intervals throughout the day.

No matter what ails you - Jokester is the best medicine. Unless, of course, you need a real medicine.
Sitting in a boring meeting? Having a bad day? Or simply want to have a few good laughs to raise your spirits? Jokester will keep your mood up by displaying hilarious jokes on your smartwatch – and letting you know the joke has arrived by vibrating your watch a little. Share with friends and family and put a smile on their face! Never get bored - new funny jokes are added every couple of days.

Jokester is a part of A Smarter Watch family - Kanda Software’s suite of informative, motivational and entertainment apps that you can enjoy on your Android Wear devices.

Features:
● Set a time frame during the day when you want to see jokes on your smart watch;
● Control how many jokes you want to receive per day – anywhere from 1 to 20;
● Jokes are refreshed every couple of days automatically – no need to download anything;
● Jokes are delivered to your Android Wear at random intervals, so you are always pleasantly surprised.
comments: A good idea in theory and I like the way the jokes pop up on the watch. Unfortunately I get the same 10 or so jokes on repeat, the long jokes have the end cut off when you scroll down and I only get 1 or 2 jokes a day despite setting the frequency to the highest setting.

Hmmm Works fine. Better is I could just open the app on my watch and scroll through joke categories, like maybe 5 types of jokes and I can scroll through them. Please respond with your honest thoughts, thanks again

I like the idea of this app and the jokes are great to see randomly.  Just one thing.  When the joke pops up the, screen stays on for a long time taking up precious battery of my moto360.  Could you please make a setting to turn off screen sooner?  Also the once the screen turns off I do not see the joke when i turn the screen back on so I may miss it.
No jokes I had this app working fine. Now im lucky if i get one joke a day are you running out of jokes? Could be a great app
I'm really mad because It did not show up on my watch and I dont know how to activate it for my watch please reply soon if I get help I will rate this five stars
Good but... Needs more jokes daily. I have everything turned on and up and I hardly get like 1 a day
recentChanges: Start sharing jokes with your friends on Facebook, Twitter and Google+.
Filter by jokes categories, we have added long jokes and dirty jokes.
Dirty jokes can be covered before revealing.
